column4: hey all....i need some assistance with ubuntu 5.10 and a compaq nc6120 using an external monitro....
anyone in here who could help me?
is that a pc or notebook?
the just try it. Use live cd
oh so you do get something
you will need to find vertical and horizontal sync just in case
find the specs and manully edit xorg.conf
add the syncs and resolutions there
back up your old xorg.conf first
just add the highest resolutions possible until it works if you don't know exactly
